EmailTemplate.subject: Invitation: Learn How to Become the Next Disruptor
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/de/event/digital-transformation-forum/frankfurt]]> Daimler, Volkswagen, BMW, Tesla, and Ford have all chosen Pivotal to help them build and deploy their connected car applications and create modern new user experiences. Pivotal helped Morgan Stanley, HSBC, and Santander enable digital business models to develop innovative new services. Find out how Pivotal is helping leading companies across all vertical sectors accelerate digital transformation and innovation through a cutting edge software development methodology and the worldâ€™s leading modern cloud platform.
Join the Digital Transformation Forum <[[http://pivotal.io/event/digital-transformation-forum/frankfurt]]> and learn how to innovate at start-up speeds and become a new kind of leader in your market space!
Date: June 8th 2016 Time : 9h00 to 16h30 Location: Hilton Frankfurt Airport Hotel
Register now as space is limited.
REGISTER NOW <[[http://pivotal.io/event/digital-transformation-forum/frankfurt]]>
We look forward to seeing you soon!
The Pivotal Team
